content: this easy crochet coffee cup cozy pattern is great for fall fairs and gift giving made with worsted weight yarn it s easy enough for beginner crocheters the cute design will dress up any cup and the cozy will keep your hands from getting too cold in the cooler weather this is a great project to use up some of that worsted weight yarn in your stash and would make a beautiful handmade gift for someone special coffee cup template can be purchased separately here https //www etsy com/ca/listing/1093062778/printable-crochet-coffee-cup-template this easy crochet cosy pattern will surprise and delight your friends and family surprise them with a warm and heart-warming gift this year download and get started with this crochet cozy pattern today last minute hostess gift need to fill your craft table this is the pattern you must try use up your scraps of yarn and make these little cozies by the dozens using only the basic stitches below everyone will enjoy making these description you will one pdf download with crochet cup cozy pattern skill level is easy skills needed single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet crochet cup cozy pattern comes in one size made with worsted weight yarn written in standard american terms
